content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet you will recieve a complete written crochet pattern that includes charts if you purchase the pattern today there will be videos released for each part in the cal if you are participating in the free cal that features the over brook baby blanket it will be released on my blog in parts here is the schedule for the release for each part july 14th - part 1 july 21 - part 2 july 28 - part 3 aug 4 - part 4 - the border the video for part 1 has been released click this link 1 the video for part 2 has been released click this link 2 2 the video for part 3 has been released click this link 3 copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2022 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed 1 https //youtu be/w5vi2hbwv_o 2 https //youtu be/qsblprzzw6u 3 https //youtu be/nbhglnahrbw
